text: dvAtOq anu# vAtu tEq tasmai# tE rudrEduvathsaqrENaq nama#skarOmiq yattE# rudrOqpariq dhanuqstad-vAtOq anu# vAtu tEq tasmai# tE rudra vathsaqrENaq nama#skarOmi ruqdrO vA EqSha yadaqgniH sa yathA$ vyAqGraH kruqddhastiShTha#tyEqvaM ~MvA EqSha Eqtar.hiq sa~jci#tamEqtairupa# tiShThatE namaskAqrairEqvaina(gm)# Samayatiq yE$&gnaya#H - [  ] 32
